name: ozkan-insaat-corporate
description: Premium corporate website for Özkan İnşaat - Construction & Excavation Group

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run db:setup
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.db:setup: cd backend && npx prisma generate && npx prisma migrate dev
